description:
Vincent Vega Plays Tarintino, A night of surf, soul and rockn'roll bangers from Quentin Tarantino's cult classic films, played with great vengeance & furious anger by Wellingtons favourite surf-rock saviours Vincent Vega. Expect tunes from Pulp Fiction, Reservoir Dogs, Once Upon A Time In Hollywood, The Hateful Eight, Death Proof and more.

Featuring special guests Lisa Tomlins on vocals and Louis TM on keys and vocals, as well as the usual suspects in Richard Te One (drums), Nick Lissette (bass) and Chris Armour (guitar)

Music from 9:30pm FREE ENTRY
label: Music & Concerts

description:
'TONES OF SILENCE' - FUTUNA CHAPEL IN B&W - EXHIBITION, ‘TONES of SILENCE’ – FUTUNA CHAPEL in BLACK & WHITE - EXHIBITION
The ‘Tones of Silence’ -explored through B & W photography taken with vintage camera and lenses to give another way of viewing and experiencing the Chapel. This exhibition will explore the tones, textures, composition and forms of the Chapel in black and white with many shades of grey.
"Generally, the older the equipment, the greater the personal input of the photographer is required and therefore the greater the commitment and individuality. Often, you can look at a 19th-century photograph and tell who the photographer is. You certainly can't do that today. It isn't only the camera and lens, but also the type of film (or in those days, glass plate), the developer used and how the print is made onto particular types of paper. Each gives a distinct interpretation".
John Grace - email - 18/06/25
The Trust looks forward to welcoming architects, designers, graduates, students and interested members of the public to attend this event and support the Trust in its work.
The Futuna Trust is a charitable organisation and all koha received from the exhibition events will go towards the ongoing care, maintenance and operation of Futuna Chapel and also to support various initiatives undertaken by the Trust.  Please register
BOOKINGS ARE PREFERRED TO ATTEND THIS EVENT

description: History of Film Technology: A Talk, A talk on the history of film technology. Explore the evolution of film cameras, projectors, and sound systems, from early silent films to modern digital cinema. This event is for anyone interested in the history of film.
label: Film & Media

description: Environmental Film Festival: A Showcase of Green Cinema, A film festival focused on films about the environment. Watch a curated selection of films that explore environmental issues, from climate change and conservation to sustainability and activism. This festival celebrates the power of film to inspire change.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Society Presents: 'The Grand Illusion' (1937), The Wellington Film Society is screening Jean Renoir's masterpiece 'The Grand Illusion'. Set during World War I, this film explores class, nationality, and the futility of war through the eyes of French prisoners of war. It's a poignant and critically acclaimed classic. Join us at The Roxy Cinema for this timeless cinematic experience. French with English subtitles.
label: Film & Media

description: Behind the Scenes of 'Lord of the Rings': A VFX Masterclass, Dive into the magic of filmmaking with a special event at the Weta Workshop. A senior VFX artist who worked on the 'Lord of the Rings' trilogy will share secrets on creating the epic battles, stunning landscapes, and fantastical creatures that brought Middle-earth to life. This is a rare opportunity for fans and aspiring filmmakers alike.
label: Film & Media

description: Indie Film Showcase: Wellington Shorts, A night dedicated to celebrating local talent. We'll be screening a collection of short films created by Wellington-based independent filmmakers. From compelling dramas to quirky comedies, this showcase is a great way to discover new voices and support the city's vibrant film community. A Q&A with the directors will follow the screening.
label: Film & Media

description: Auteur: A David Lynch Retrospective, Join us for an immersive weekend celebrating the surreal and captivating world of David Lynch. We'll be screening his iconic films, including 'Eraserhead,' 'Mulholland Drive,' and 'Blue Velvet,' followed by a panel discussion on his unique style, recurring themes, and influence on cinema. Located at the Lighthouse Cinema.
label: Film & Media

description: Classic Horror Film Night: 'Psycho', Experience Alfred Hitchcock's 'Psycho' like never before on the big screen. This masterpiece of suspense and psychological horror is a must-see for any film buff. We'll have a special introduction to the film's history and its impact on the horror genre. Get ready to be terrified.
label: Film & Media

description: Family Movie Matinee: 'Moana', Bring the whānau for a fun and free screening of Disney's 'Moana' at the Waitohi Hub. Enjoy a day of music and adventure as you follow Moana's journey across the ocean. Free popcorn and juice will be provided for all attendees. This is a family-friendly event for all ages.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Documentary Film Series: 'The Last Ocean', The Wellington Documentary Film Series presents a screening of 'The Last Ocean,' a powerful film about the fight to protect the pristine Ross Sea in Antarctica. The screening will be followed by a Q&A with a marine biologist from Victoria University of Wellington to discuss the film's message and ongoing conservation efforts.
label: Film & Media

description: Animation Workshop for Teens, An interactive workshop for aspiring animators aged 13-17. Learn the basics of stop-motion and digital animation from a professional animator. We'll cover character design, storyboarding, and simple animation techniques using industry-standard software. All materials and laptops will be provided.
label: Film & Media

description: Sci-Fi Film Marathon: 'Blade Runner' & 'Dune', Get ready for an epic night of science fiction with a double-feature screening of two iconic films. We'll show Ridley Scott's original 'Blade Runner' and Denis Villeneuve's 'Dune'. The event includes a short intermission with sci-fi themed refreshments and a discussion on world-building in cinema.
label: Film & Media

description: Filmmaking 101: A Beginner's Workshop, Have you ever wanted to make your own film but don't know where to start? This one-day workshop will cover the fundamentals of filmmaking, from scriptwriting and shooting to editing and post-production. You'll work in small teams to create your own short film by the end of the day.
label: Film & Media

description: Studio Ghibli Film Festival: 'My Neighbour Totoro', Celebrate the magic of Studio Ghibli with a special screening of 'My Neighbour Totoro' at The Embassy Theatre. This enchanting film is a must-see for all ages and a perfect introduction to the world of Japanese animation. We'll also have a raffle for a Studio Ghibli prize pack.
label: Film & Media

description: Silent Film Night with Live Music: 'Nosferatu', Step back in time for a unique cinematic experience. We'll be screening the 1922 silent horror film 'Nosferatu' with a live, improvised musical score performed by a local musician. This is a rare chance to see a classic horror film as it was originally intended.
label: Film & Media

description: Outdoor Movie Night: 'Boy', Enjoy a free outdoor screening of Taika Waititi's beloved film 'Boy' at the Waitangi Park waterfront. Bring a blanket, some snacks, and the whānau for a night of laughter and heart. Food trucks will be on-site, and the film will start at sundown.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film History: A Walking Tour, Explore the cinematic history of Wellington with a guided walking tour. We'll visit iconic filming locations from 'Lord of the Rings' to more recent productions, learning about the city's transformation into a major film hub. The tour ends at a local pub for a casual film discussion.
label: Film & Media

description: Experimental Film Showcase, Join us for a night of avant-garde and experimental cinema. We'll be showcasing a curated selection of films that push the boundaries of traditional storytelling. This event is for cinephiles and artists interested in exploring new forms of visual expression.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington International Film Festival: 'The Past is Not Dead', A preview screening of the new local film 'The Past is Not Dead' as part of the Wellington International Film Festival. This historical drama explores family secrets and long-lost love in 19th-century New Zealand. A Q&A with the director and lead actors will follow the screening.
label: Film & Media

description: Filmmaking for Beginners: Smartphone Edition, Learn how to make a high-quality film using just your smartphone in this practical workshop. We'll cover techniques for shooting, sound recording, and editing on your mobile device. This is a great way to get into filmmaking without needing expensive equipment.
label: Film & Media

description: 'Finding Nemo' Movie Night with the Whānau, The Wellington Library is hosting a free screening of 'Finding Nemo' for a family movie night. Bring the kids for an adventure under the sea with Marlin and Dory as they search for Nemo. We'll have a themed craft activity before the film starts.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Women's Film Collective: New Voices, A special screening of short films from emerging female filmmakers in Wellington. This event, hosted by the Wellington Women's Film Collective, celebrates new and diverse voices in cinema. A panel discussion on women in film will follow the screenings.
label: Film & Media

description: Anime Night: 'Spirited Away', Join us at the St. James Theatre for a screening of Hayao Miyazaki's masterpiece 'Spirited Away'. This critically acclaimed film tells the story of a young girl's adventure in a world of spirits and monsters. The screening will have English subtitles and a short discussion on the film's themes.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Pop-Up Cinema: 'Pulp Fiction', A special pop-up cinema event in a secret location, screening Quentin Tarantino's 'Pulp Fiction.' Expect a night of cult classic cinema, delicious food, and themed cocktails. The location will be revealed to ticket holders 24 hours before the event.
label: Film & Media

description: Screenwriting Workshop with a WGA Member, An exclusive workshop with a Writers Guild of America member and professional screenwriter. Learn about the craft of screenwriting, from character development and plot structure to pitching and working in the industry. This is a must-attend for aspiring writers.
label: Film & Media

description: Children's Movie Day: 'The Lion King', The Community Hub is hosting a free children's movie day with a screening of 'The Lion King'. Come and sing along to the classic songs with your little ones. We'll have face painting and a fun art activity before the film.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Collective: 'No Country for Old Men', A special screening of the Coen Brothers' 'No Country for Old Men' at The Roxy Cinema. This neo-Western thriller is a masterclass in tension and storytelling. The film will be followed by a discussion on the Coen Brothers' cinematic style and the film's themes.
label: Film & Media

description: Editing Masterclass with a Senior Editor, A hands-on masterclass with a senior film editor from Park Road Post Production. Learn about the art and craft of film editing, from pacing and rhythm to visual storytelling. This is a fantastic opportunity for students and professionals to learn from a top industry expert.
label: Film & Media

description: Found Footage Horror Film Festival, A night of found footage horror films at the Vogelmorn Bowling Club. We'll be screening a selection of films that use the found footage format to create a terrifyingly immersive experience. A discussion on the history of the sub-genre will follow the screenings. R18+
label: Film & Media

description: Behind the Lens: A Cinematography Workshop, Learn the art of visual storytelling in this hands-on cinematography workshop. A professional cinematographer will teach you about camera angles, lighting, and composition to help you create stunning and impactful images for your films.
label: Film & Media

description: Film Music Showcase: The John Williams Experience, Celebrate the legendary film composer John Williams with a special concert by the Wellington Youth Orchestra. They will be performing his iconic scores from 'Star Wars,' 'Jurassic Park,' 'Indiana Jones,' and many more. This is a magical night for film and music lovers.
label: Film & Media

description: Documentary Workshop: Telling Your Story, Learn how to create your own documentary film in this comprehensive workshop. We'll cover everything from finding a compelling story and conducting interviews to editing and sound design. This is a great opportunity to learn how to tell a powerful story about your community.
label: Film & Media

description: Noir Film Festival: The Maltese Falcon, The Embassy Theatre is hosting a Noir Film Festival, and we're starting with the classic 'The Maltese Falcon.' Join us for a screening of this iconic film noir, followed by a discussion on its influence on the genre and its place in cinematic history.
label: Film & Media

description: DIY Film Club: '2001: A Space Odyssey' & Pizza Night, The DIY Film Club is screening Stanley Kubrick's '2001: A Space Odyssey.' Join us at the Newtown Community Centre for a night of mind-bending cinema, with a discussion on the film's legacy and themes. We'll also have free pizza and drinks for all attendees.
label: Film & Media

description: Kids' Stop-Motion Animation Workshop, A hands-on workshop for kids aged 7-12 where they'll learn the basics of stop-motion animation. Using clay, LEGO, and other materials, they'll create their own short animated film to take home. All materials and equipment will be provided.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Comedy Film Festival: 'What We Do in the Shadows', Celebrate local comedy with a screening of Taika Waititi and Jemaine Clement's 'What We Do in the Shadows.' This mockumentary about a group of vampire flatmates in Wellington is a hilarious look at the supernatural. The screening will be followed by a Q&A with one of the filmmakers.
label: Film & Media

description: A Night with the Aotearoa Film Archive, The Aotearoa Film Archive is hosting a special night of screenings from their collection. We'll be showing a selection of rare and historical New Zealand films, from early cinematic works to experimental shorts. This is a unique opportunity to see our country's film history on the big screen.
label: Film & Media

description: The Art of Documentary: A Q&A with Gaylene Preston, An intimate Q&A with renowned New Zealand filmmaker Gaylene Preston. She'll discuss her career, her approach to documentary filmmaking, and the challenges of telling real-life stories. This is a must-attend for anyone interested in documentary and storytelling.
label: Film & Media

description: Outdoor Cinema: 'The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring', An outdoor cinema event at the Wellington Botanic Gardens, screening 'The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring.' Bring a blanket and enjoy the film under the stars. Food and drinks will be available for purchase.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Critics Circle: 'Parasite' Screening & Discussion, The Wellington Film Critics Circle is hosting a screening of Bong Joon-ho's 'Parasite,' followed by a lively discussion on its themes, direction, and cultural impact. This is a great opportunity to engage with other film lovers and share your thoughts on this modern classic.
label: Film & Media

description: Children's Book-to-Film Showcase, A special screening of animated films based on popular children's books. This free event at the Johnsonville Community Centre is perfect for young readers and their families. We'll have a storytelling session and a craft table before the films begin.
label: Film & Media

description: The Art of Visual Effects: A Panel Discussion, A panel discussion with leading visual effects artists from Wellington's film industry. They'll discuss the latest technologies, challenges, and creative processes involved in creating stunning visual effects for blockbusters and independent films. This is a great opportunity for students and professionals to learn about the industry.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington's Film Heritage: A Tour of The Embassy, A guided tour of The Embassy Theatre, one of Wellington's most iconic and historic cinemas. Learn about its rich history, architectural features, and famous events. The tour will also include a short screening of a classic film trailer.
label: Film & Media

description: Fantasy Film Festival: 'Pan's Labyrinth', A screening of Guillermo del Toro's dark fantasy film 'Pan's Labyrinth' at the BATS Theatre. This magical and heartbreaking film is a must-see for fans of fantasy and art-house cinema. The screening will be followed by a Q&A with a local film critic.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Workshop: The Art of the Soundscape, A hands-on workshop on sound design and foley artistry for film. Learn how to create immersive soundscapes and enhance your film's emotional impact. This is a great opportunity to learn a new skill and add another layer to your filmmaking.
label: Film & Media

description: Queer Film Festival: 'Call Me by Your Name', A screening of Luca Guadagnino's romantic drama 'Call Me by Your Name' at the Lighthouse Cinema. This beautiful and moving film is a coming-of-age story set in 1980s Italy. The screening is part of a series celebrating queer cinema and will be followed by a discussion on the film's themes.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington International Film Festival: 'The Piano', A special screening of Jane Campion's 'The Piano' at the St. James Theatre. This powerful and iconic New Zealand film is a must-see on the big screen. The screening will be followed by a short discussion on its place in New Zealand cinema history.
label: Film & Media

description: Film Editing with Final Cut Pro, A two-day intensive workshop for beginners who want to learn how to edit films using Final Cut Pro. We'll cover the basics of the software, from importing footage to color correction and sound mixing. This is a great way to kickstart your editing career.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Club: 'Mad Max: Fury Road', A screening of George Miller's action masterpiece 'Mad Max: Fury Road.' Join us at The Roxy Cinema for a night of high-octane action and stunning visuals. The screening will be followed by a discussion on practical effects and filmmaking in the digital age.
label: Film & Media

description: Children's Film Festival: 'The Secret of Kells', The Wellington Library is hosting a children's film festival with a screening of 'The Secret of Kells.' This beautifully animated film is a journey into Irish mythology and folklore. We'll have a themed craft activity and snacks before the film.
label: Film & Media

description: The Art of the B-Movie: A Discussion Panel, A fun and informative panel discussion on the history and appeal of B-movies. From schlocky horror to low-budget sci-fi, we'll discuss what makes these films so enduringly popular. The panel will be followed by a surprise screening of a classic B-movie.
label: Film & Media

description: Film Industry Networking Event, Connect with other filmmakers, writers, actors, and industry professionals at this networking event. Whether you're looking for collaborators for your next project or just want to meet like-minded people, this is the place to be. Drinks and snacks will be provided.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington Film Festival: A Preview Night, A special preview night for the upcoming Wellington Film Festival. We'll be showing trailers and clips from a selection of films, and discussing what to look forward to in this year's festival. Free drinks and popcorn will be provided.
label: Film & Media

description: Wellington International Film Festival: 'The Past is Not Dead', A preview screening of the new local film 'The Past is Not Dead' as part of the Wellington International Film Festival. label: Film & Media

This magical and heartbreaking film is a must-see for fans of fantasy and art-house cinema. The screening will be followed by a Q&A with a local film critic.
label: Film & Media

description: Global Street Food Fair, A world of flavor in one place. Our street food fair features vendors from around the globe, serving up authentic dishes from their home countries. Taste everything from spicy Mexican tacos to savory Malaysian satay and sweet French crepes. A vibrant and delicious celebration of Wellington's diverse culinary community.
label: Food & Drink

description: Brewery Tour & Tasting, Go behind the scenes at a local brewery. Learn about the brewing process, from malting to bottling, and meet the master brewers. The tour concludes with a guided tasting of their full range of beers, from crisp lagers to hoppy IPAs. A perfect outing for beer lovers.
label: Food & Drink

description: Dumplings & Drink-Making, A relaxed and fun workshop where you will learn to make delicious dumplings from scratch while also learning how to craft your own unique cocktails. This is a great way to meet new people and hone new skills.
label: Food & Drink

description: Dessert Degustation, An evening of pure indulgence. Our pastry chef has created a multi-course dessert degustation, with each dish a work of art. From rich chocolate mousses to delicate fruit tarts and innovative ice creams, this is a sweet feast for the eyes and the palate. Wine and cocktail pairings are also available.
label: Food & Drink

description: The Ultimate Fish & Chips, A tribute to the classic Kiwi takeaway. Our chefs have perfected the art of fish and chips, from the light, crispy batter to the perfectly cooked chips. Served with a selection of house-made sauces and a cold beer. Simple, classic, and absolutely delicious.
label: Food & Drink

description: Vegetarian Cooking Class, Learn to create delicious and innovative vegetarian dishes in this hands-on cooking class. Our chef will guide you through a menu that celebrates vegetables, from hearty main courses to flavorful side dishes. You'll leave with new recipes and skills to impress your friends and family.
label: Food & Drink

description: Pizza & Wine Pairing, A fun and laid-back evening of pizza and wine. Our sommelier has selected a range of local and international wines to pair with a variety of gourmet pizzas. Discover how different wines can bring out the flavors of different toppings, from classic pepperoni to exotic vegetarian combinations.
label: Food & Drink

description: Gourmet Hot Dogs & Craft Beer, Elevate your hot dog game at this special event. Our chefs have created a menu of gourmet hot dogs with unique toppings and sauces, from kimchi to truffle aioli. Each hot dog is paired with a local craft beer, making for a delicious and fun night out.
label: Food & Drink

description: A Journey Through Chocolate, An immersive experience into the world of chocolate. Learn about the history of cacao, from bean to bar, and how chocolate is made. Our chocolate expert will guide you through a tasting of a variety of chocolates from different regions, with unique flavor profiles and textures.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Waterfront Bar Crawl, Explore Wellington's vibrant waterfront bar scene with this curated bar crawl. Your ticket includes a drink at four different bars, with a new cocktail created just for this event at each location. A fun and social way to discover new favorite spots and enjoy the beautiful harbor views.
label: Food & Drink

description: Gin & Tonic Masterclass, Become a gin and tonic expert in this hands-on masterclass. Learn about the history of gin, the different botanicals used in production, and how to create the perfect G&T. You'll get to try a variety of gins and tonics, with different garnishes and flavor pairings.
label: Food & Drink

description: Baking Workshop: Sourdough Bread, Master the art of sourdough bread in this intensive baking workshop. Learn to create and maintain your own starter, mix and knead the dough, and bake a perfect loaf with a crispy crust and chewy interior. All materials provided, and you get to take home your freshly baked bread.
label: Food & Drink

description: Winter Warming Soups & Stews, Chase away the winter chill with this cozy cooking class. Learn to make a variety of hearty soups and stews from around the world, from French onion soup to a spicy Mexican posole. The class ends with a communal feast of all the dishes we've prepared, with fresh bread and a glass of wine.
label: Food & Drink

description: Taco Tuesday Pop-Up, Our famous Taco Tuesday Pop-Up is back! We're serving up a rotating menu of gourmet tacos, from classic carne asada to creative vegetarian options. Pair your tacos with a selection of tequilas and margaritas, and enjoy the lively atmosphere with live music.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Burger Challenge, It's Burger Wellington time! Join us for our entry into the annual burger challenge. Our chefs have created a unique burger with local ingredients and a delicious twist. Vote for your favorite burger, and enjoy a cold beer with a delicious meal.
label: Food & Drink

description: French Wine & Cheese Tasting, An elegant evening of French wine and cheese. Our sommelier has selected a range of classic French wines, from crisp Sancerre to bold Bordeaux, to pair with a variety of French cheeses. Learn about the different regions and production methods, and enjoy the perfect combination of flavors.
label: Food & Drink

description: Food Photography Workshop, Learn to take beautiful photos of your food in this hands-on workshop. Our professional food photographer will teach you about lighting, composition, and styling to make your dishes look their best. A great class for bloggers, social media enthusiasts, and anyone who loves to capture their culinary creations.
label: Food & Drink

description: The Great Cookie Bake-Off, A friendly competition for all baking enthusiasts. Bring your best batch of cookies to compete for the title of best cookie in Wellington. Prizes for best flavor, best texture, and most creative. A fun and delicious night of tasting and voting, with milk and coffee available.
label: Food & Drink

description: Whisky & Chocolate Masterclass, A match made in heaven. This event pairs a selection of premium whiskies from around the world with a variety of handcrafted chocolates. Our expert will guide you through the tasting notes and flavor profiles, and teach you how to find the perfect pairing.
label: Food & Drink

description: Gourmet Toasties & Local Wine, Elevate your toastie game with our gourmet toastie menu. Our chefs have created a range of delicious toasties, from classic cheese and onion to more adventurous options. Each toastie is perfectly paired with a local wine, making for a sophisticated and comforting meal.
label: Food & Drink

description: Kids' Pizza Making Workshop, A fun and creative workshop for kids. Our chefs will teach kids how to make their own pizza from scratch, from kneading the dough to choosing their own toppings. A messy and delicious class that ends with a feast of their own creations.
label: Food & Drink

description: Asian Fusion Feast, A multi-course dinner that celebrates the vibrant flavors of Asian fusion cuisine. Our chefs have created a menu that blends traditional Asian dishes with modern techniques and local ingredients. Each course is a new taste adventure, with a cocktail pairing designed to complement the unique flavors.
label: Food & Drink

description: Summer Garden Party, A celebration of Wellington's summer with a garden party. Our menu features a selection of light and fresh canapés and cocktails, with a focus on local produce and seasonal flavors. Enjoy live music, lawn games, and the beautiful surroundings of a local garden.
label: Food & Drink

description: Craft Beer & BBQ Night, A night of craft beer and barbecue. We're serving up a selection of slow-cooked meats, from pulled pork to brisket, with a variety of house-made sauces and sides. Pair your meal with a selection of local craft beers, and enjoy the lively atmosphere with live music.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Food & Drink Festival, A celebration of Wellington's vibrant food and drink scene. Over two days, you'll find a huge range of food trucks, pop-up bars, and local vendors, serving up everything from gourmet burgers to artisanal ice cream. With live music, cooking demonstrations, and workshops, this is a must-visit event for all foodies.
label: Food & Drink

description: High Tea with a Twist, A classic high tea with a modern twist. Our menu features a selection of sweet and savory treats, from mini sandwiches to innovative pastries, with a focus on local and seasonal ingredients. Paired with a range of fine teas and a glass of bubbly, this is a stylish and delicious afternoon.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Chocolate Festival, A celebration of all things chocolate. Local chocolatiers and bakers will be showcasing their creations, from handmade truffles to decadent cakes. You'll find a range of chocolate-inspired products, from hot chocolate to chocolate-flavored craft beer. A must-visit event for any chocolate lover.
label: Food & Drink

description: The Great Wellington Bake Off, A friendly baking competition for all skill levels. Bring your best baked goods to compete for the title of Wellington's best baker. Prizes for best cake, best bread, and most creative. A delicious and fun night of tasting and voting, with coffee and tea available.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Waterfront Market, A weekly market on the Wellington waterfront, featuring a selection of local food and drink vendors. You'll find everything from fresh produce to artisanal cheeses, baked goods, and hot coffee. A great way to start your weekend and support local businesses.
label: Food & Drink

description: Sunday Roast at The Thistle Inn, The ultimate Sunday roast at Wellington's oldest pub. Our chefs are serving up a classic roast with all the trimmings, from crispy potatoes to Yorkshire pudding. Pair your meal with a glass of red wine or a local craft beer, and enjoy the cozy and historic atmosphere.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Foodies Market, A celebration of Wellington's local food scene. Our market features a selection of local food vendors, from gourmet cheese to artisanal bread, coffee, and chocolate. You'll also find cooking demonstrations, workshops, and a range of food-related products. A must-visit for any food lover.
label: Food & Drink

description: Kids' Cooking Class, A fun and interactive cooking class for kids. Our chefs will teach kids how to make simple and healthy meals, from fresh pasta to delicious desserts. A great way to get kids interested in cooking and healthy eating, with a communal feast at the end of the class.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Food Tour, A guided walking tour of Wellington's best food spots. Our local expert will take you to a selection of cafes, restaurants, and bars, where you'll get to sample a range of local delicacies, from coffee to craft beer, cheese, and chocolate. A great way to discover new favorite spots and learn about Wellington's food scene.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Food and Drink Festival, A two-day festival celebrating all things food and drink in Wellington. You'll find a huge range of food trucks, pop-up bars, and local vendors, serving up everything from gourmet burgers to artisanal ice cream. With live music, cooking demonstrations, and workshops, this is a must-visit event for all foodies.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Seafood Festival, A celebration of Wellington's seafood scene. Our festival features a selection of local seafood vendors, serving up everything from fresh oysters to fish and chips, seafood chowder, and more. With live music and cooking demonstrations, this is a great way to celebrate our local seafood.
label: Food & Drink

description: Gourmet Hot Chocolate Festival, Indulge your sweet tooth at our annual Gourmet Hot Chocolate Festival. Local cafes and chocolatiers compete for the title of best hot chocolate, offering unique flavors and decadent toppings. Vote for your favorite and enjoy live music in a cozy atmosphere. From classic dark chocolate to spiced chili and lavender infusions, there's a cup for every chocolate lover.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Seafood Boil, Get your hands dirty at our Wellington Seafood Boil. A communal feast with fresh crayfish, mussels, clams, and corn, all boiled in a spicy, aromatic broth. Bibs and hammers are provided, along with local craft beers and ciders. A night of great company, messy eating, and incredible local seafood.
label: Food & Drink

description: Dumpling Workshop & Dinner, Learn the art of dumpling making from a master chef. This hands-on workshop will teach you how to fold, fill, and cook different types of dumplings, from traditional pork and cabbage to creative vegetarian options. After the class, we'll feast on a banquet of our handmade creations and other delicious Asian-inspired dishes.
label: Food & Drink

description: Burger & Craft Beer Pairing, Join us for an evening dedicated to the perfect pairing: burgers and craft beer. Our chefs have created a unique menu of four gourmet mini-burgers, each expertly matched with a different local craft beer. Discover how different flavors and textures enhance each other in this delicious and educational experience.
label: Food & Drink

description: Wellington Coffee Festival, A celebration of Wellington's vibrant coffee scene. Meet local roasters, learn about different brewing methods, and sample a wide range of specialty coffees. Workshops on home brewing, latte art, and coffee tasting will be held throughout the day. The festival is a must-visit for any true coffee aficionado.
label: Food & Drink

description: Vegan High Tea, Enjoy a sophisticated afternoon with our plant-based high tea. Our menu features a delightful selection of vegan sandwiches, scones with jam and cream, and exquisite pastries. Paired with a range of fine teas and herbal infusions, this is a guilt-free indulgence for all.
label: Food & Drink

description: Artisanal Cheese & Wine Night, An evening for the epicurious. Our cheesemongers have curated a selection of New Zealand's finest artisanal cheeses, from creamy bries to aged cheddars. Each cheese is thoughtfully paired with a local or international wine, with experts on hand to guide you through the tasting notes and flavor profiles.
label: Food & Drink

description: Barbecue Masterclass, Fire up your skills at our Barbecue Masterclass. Learn the secrets to smoking brisket, slow-cooking ribs, and grilling the perfect steak. Our pitmasters will teach you everything from rub recipes to temperature control. The class ends with a massive feast of all the delicious food we've prepared.
label: Food & Drink

description: A Night in Italy: Pasta Making, Experience the heart of Italian cuisine in this hands-on pasta-making class. Learn to make fresh pasta from scratch, including fettuccine and ravioli. Our Italian chef will guide you through the process and share tips for creating authentic sauces. The class culminates in a shared meal with your handmade pasta, paired with a glass of Italian wine.
label: Food & Drink

description: Japanese Whisky & Sake Tasting, Discover the nuanced world of Japanese spirits. This tasting event features a curated selection of premium Japanese whiskies and a variety of sakes, from dry to sweet. Learn about the history, production methods, and tasting notes from our expert host, paired with traditional Japanese snacks.
label: Food & Drink

description: Summer on a Plate: A Taster of New Zealand's Best, A seasonal celebration of fresh, local produce. This multi-course meal is designed to showcase the best of New Zealand's summer bounty, from fresh-caught fish to sun-ripened berries. Each dish is a tribute to the growers, farmers, and fishers who make our food scene so special.
label: Food & Drink

description: Cocktail Making Workshop: Tiki Edition, Learn to shake, stir, and muddle your way to a perfect Tiki cocktail. Our mixologist will guide you through creating classic Tiki drinks like Mai Tais and Zombies, with a focus on fresh juices and tropical garnishes. Aloha shirts and a sense of adventure are encouraged.
label: Food & Drink

description: Farmers' Market Brunch, Start your weekend right with a pop-up brunch using the freshest ingredients from the local farmers' market. Our chefs will be creating a seasonal menu on the spot, from farm-fresh eggs to foraged mushrooms. Enjoy your meal with live acoustic music and fresh-pressed juices.
label: Food & Drink

description: Global Street Food Fair, A world of flavor in one place. Our street food fair features vendors from around the globe, serving up authentic dishes from their home countries. Taste everything from spicy Mexican tacos to savory Malaysian satay and sweet French crepes. A vibrant and delicious celebration of Wellington's diverse culinary community.
label: Food & Drink

description: Chocolate & Gin Pairing, A match made in heaven. This event pairs artisanal chocolates from a local chocolatier with a selection of New Zealand gins. Learn how the botanicals in gin complement the different cocoa percentages and flavor profiles of chocolate. A sophisticated and delicious night out.
label: Food & Drink

description: Brewery Tour & Tasting, Go behind the scenes at a local brewery. Learn about the brewing process, from malting to bottling, and meet the master brewers. The tour concludes with a guided tasting of their full range of beers, from crisp lagers to hoppy IPAs. A perfect outing for beer lovers.
label: Food & Drink

description: Dumplings & Drink-Making, A relaxed and fun workshop where you will learn to make delicious dumplings from scratch while also learning how to craft your own unique cocktails. This is a great way to meet new people and hone new skills.
label: Food & Drink

description: Dessert Degustation, An evening of pure indulgence. Our pastry chef has created a multi-course dessert degustation, with each dish a work of art. From rich chocolate mousses to delicate fruit tarts and innovative ice creams, this is a sweet feast for the eyes and the palate. Wine and cocktail pairings are also available.
label: Food & Drink

description: Post-Workout Recovery Workshop, Learn how to properly recover after a workout to prevent injury, reduce muscle soreness, and enhance your performance. A physiotherapist and a sports nutritionist will cover topics like stretching, foam rolling, hydration, and post-workout nutrition. Includes a hands-on stretching session.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Mindful Mondays: Meditation for Stress Relief, Join us for a guided meditation session every Monday evening designed to help you de-stress and cultivate a sense of calm. This class is suitable for all levels, from beginners to experienced meditators, and focuses on simple, effective techniques to manage a busy mind. End your day by finding peace and grounding yourself for the week ahead.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Tai Chi for Beginners, Join our introductory Tai Chi class and learn the gentle, flowing movements of this ancient martial art. Tai Chi improves balance, flexibility, and mental focus, and is a great way to support both physical and mental health. No experience or special equipment is needed.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Gut Health & Fermentation, Dive into the world of fermented foods and discover how they can transform your gut health. This interactive workshop covers the science behind a healthy microbiome and teaches you how to make simple ferments like kombucha, sauerkraut, and kimchi at home. Learn how to nourish your body from the inside out.
label: Health & Wellness

description: The Power of Sleep: A Wellness Seminar, Learn how to optimise your sleep for better health, energy, and mental clarity. This seminar, led by a sleep specialist, covers the science of sleep, common sleep disruptors, and practical strategies to build a restorative sleep routine. Your ticket includes a booklet of tips and a calming herbal tea sample.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Pelvic Floor Workshop for Women, A practical and informative workshop for women of all ages to understand and strengthen their pelvic floor. Led by a certified physiotherapist, this session will cover anatomy, proper exercises, and techniques to improve core stability, manage incontinence, and support your body through different life stages.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Forest Bathing: A Guided Walk, Reconnect with nature and yourself in this guided forest bathing experience. Known as 'shinrin-yoku,' this practice involves mindfully walking through a natural environment to reduce stress, improve mood, and boost wellbeing. This low-impact walk is open to all fitness levels.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Somatic Movement: Releasing Stored Tension, This workshop uses gentle, guided movements to help you release chronic tension and stress stored in the body. Somatic movement is a powerful practice for nervous system regulation, pain relief, and improving body-mind awareness. No prior experience is required.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Men's Health Talk: A Modern Approach, A candid and informative discussion on men's health, covering topics from mental health and stress management to physical fitness and nutrition. This session is designed to be a safe, open space for men to ask questions and learn practical ways to improve their health. Light snacks and refreshments will be provided.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Introduction to Mindfulness, A two-hour workshop introducing the core principles of mindfulness and meditation. Learn how to live more fully in the present moment, reduce anxiety, and improve focus through simple, daily practices. Includes guided meditation and a discussion on how to integrate mindfulness into your busy life.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Nutrition for Mental Wellbeing, Explore the powerful connection between food and mood in this educational workshop. A registered dietitian will discuss key nutrients for brain health, the impact of diet on anxiety and depression, and how to build a food plan that supports your mental and emotional balance. Includes a recipe handout and a Q&A session.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Healthy Homes Workshop, Learn how to create a healthier living environment for you and your family in this practical workshop. Topics include natural cleaning alternatives, air quality improvements, and simple changes to reduce toxins in your home. All participants will receive a free starter kit of eco-friendly cleaning products.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Beginner's Hatha Yoga, An accessible and gentle Hatha yoga class perfect for beginners or anyone looking for a low-impact practice. Focus on fundamental poses, proper alignment, and breath awareness to build strength, increase flexibility, and feel more centred. Mats are available for rent.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Women's Wellness Circle, A supportive and empowering circle for women to connect, share, and explore topics of health and wellbeing. Facilitated by a life coach, this is a safe space to discuss personal growth, self-care practices, and female-specific health challenges. Light refreshments will be served.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Holistic Healing: Intro to Reiki, Discover the gentle art of Reiki, a Japanese technique for stress reduction and relaxation that also promotes healing. This introductory session explains the history and principles of Reiki, and includes a short guided meditation and a group healing practice.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Strength Training for Seniors, A safe and effective strength training class designed specifically for older adults. label: Health & Wellness

description: Yoga for Back Pain Relief, Learn gentle and effective yoga postures to alleviate chronic back pain and improve spinal health. This class focuses on building core strength, increasing flexibility, and promoting relaxation to support a healthy back. No prior yoga experience is needed.

description: Mindful Eating Workshop, This workshop helps you develop a healthier relationship with food by practising mindfulness. Learn to listen to your body's hunger and fullness cues, savour each bite, and reduce emotional eating. This is a non-diet-focused approach to nutrition and wellbeing.
label: Health & Wellness

description: Sound Healing with Tibetan Bowls, Immerse yourself in a deeply relaxing and restorative sound healing experience. The resonant vibrations of Tibetan singing bowls will guide you into a meditative state, promoting nervous system regulation and a profound sense of inner peace. Please bring a mat, blanket, and cushion for comfort.
